name: premiser-ui
description: UI for howdju.com.  Proprietary and confidential.  Copyright Carl Gieringer
author: Carl Gieringer <carl@howdju.com>

scripts.lint: yarn run lint:app && yarn run lint:build
scripts.build:local: yarn run lint:app && yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=*,-babel webpack --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:pre-prod: yarn run lint:app && yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=*,-babel API_ROOT=https://pre-prod-api.howdju.com/api/ webpack --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: yarn run lint:app && yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=*,-babel webpack --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.local: yarn run build:local && yarn run serve:local
scripts.upload:pre-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=* node bin/upload-to-s3.js pre-prod-www.howdju.com
scripts.upload:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=* node bin/upload-to-s3.js www.howdju.com
scripts.invalidate:pre-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=* node bin/create-invalidation.js E11GMSE61AJBIL
scripts.invalidate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=* node bin/create-invalidation.js E3ALDHFXYJRKKJ
scripts.deploy:pre-prod: yarn run lint:build && yarn run build:pre-prod && yarn run upload:pre-prod && yarn run invalidate:pre-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn run lint:build && yarn run build:prod && yarn run upload:prod && yarn run invalidate:prod
scripts.bookmarklet: babel --no-babelrc bookmarklet/submit.js --out-file dist/submit.js --presets=env && uglifyjs --compress negate_iife=false --mangle toplevel --output dist/submit.min.js -- dist/submit.js
